casebody.data:
JOSEPH E. CELENTANO ET AL. v. IRA B. GRUDBERG ET AL. John R. Williams, in support of the petition. Ira B. Grudberg, Trisha Morris Porto and David A. Leff in opposition. Decided May 28, 2003

PALMER, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this petition.

No opinion found.Click here to view source material.
